message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $12,000. I believe it holds significant value and would be a worthwhile investment for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer. While I understand your perspective, the product's value is quite significant to me. I could consider letting it go for $11,000.  Let me know if that works for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate it, but I am still unable to pay more than $9,000 for the product. I hope we can find a mutually agreeable price.
